banner.heading:
A place for projects, opensource softwar,evideo games 
 and fun.

1.title: Development for All
1.text: We teach programming, current, and future IT technologies for all age groups, so that you can fully utilize the digital world.

2.title: Infrastructure for Projects
2.text: We provide infrastructure for the realization of projects. We do not pursue any profit.

3.title: Support for Open Source
3.text: We support open-source projects with our experience, our infrastructure, or with code contributions.

4.title: Promotion of Collaboration
4.text: We offer a platform that promotes exchange and collaboration between beginners, enthusiasts, and professionals to develop innovative solutions together.

solar.heading: Sustainable Energy for a Green Future
solar.text: Our commitment to the environment begins with the use of solar energy to meet our energy needs. In doing so, we reduce our carbon footprint and contribute to a more sustainable world.
